mapper.select: SELECT P.PCODE, P.IMG, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.LOC, P.INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY3 C3 ON P.C3CODE = C3.C3CODE JOIN CATEGORY2 C2 ON C3.C2CODE = C2.C2CODE JOIN CATEGORY C ON C2.CCODE = C.CCODE WHERE C.CCODE = #{category}
SELECT COUNT(P.PCODE) FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY3 C3 ON P.C3CODE = C3.C3CODE JOIN CATEGORY2 C2 ON C3.C2CODE = C2.C2CODE JOIN CATEGORY C ON C2.CCODE = C.CCODE WHERE C.CCODE = #{category}
SELECT P.PCODE,P.IMG, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.LOC, P.INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY3 C3 ON P.C3CODE = C3.C3CODE JOIN CATEGORY2 C2 ON C3.C2CODE = C2.C2CODE WHERE C2.C2CODE = '${category}'
SELECT COUNT(P.PCODE) FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY3 C3 ON P.C3CODE = C3.C3CODE JOIN CATEGORY2 C2 ON C3.C2CODE = C2.C2CODE WHERE C2.C2CODE = '${category}'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, P.PCODE,P.IMG, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, P.LOC, P.INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT P JOIN CATEGORY3 C3 ON P.C3CODE = C3.C3CODE JOIN CATEGORY2 C2 ON C3.C2CODE = C2.C2CODE WHERE C2.C2CODE = '${category}' ) TB WHERE RNUM >= #{start} and RNUM <= #{end}
SELECT PCODE, IMG, PNAME, PRICE, LOC, INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE C3CODE = '${category}'
SELECT COUNT(PCODE) FROM PRODUCT WHERE C3CODE = '${category}'
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, PCODE, IMG, PNAME, PRICE, LOC, INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE C3CODE = '${category}' ) TB WHERE RNUM >= #{start} and RNUM <= #{end}
SELECT PCODE, IMG, PNAME, PRICE, LOC, INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PNAME LIKE '%${searchText}%'
SELECT count(PCODE) FROM PRODUCT WHERE PNAME LIKE '%${searchText}%'
select * from ( SELECT ROWNUM as RNUM, PCODE, IMG, PNAME, PRICE, LOC, INPUT_DATE FROM PRODUCT WHERE PNAME LIKE '%${searchText}%' ) TB where RNUM >= ${start} and RNUM <= ${end}

SELECT p.pcode, p.pname, p.context, p.img, p.price, p.img2, p.img3, p.img4, p.img5, p.input_date, p.deliver, p.status, p.saleok, p.loc, p.pcancel, p.c3code, p.id, c1.name as cname, c2.name as c2name, c3.name as c3name FROM product p, CATEGORY c1, CATEGORY2 c2, CATEGORY3 c3 WHERE c1.ccode=c2.ccode AND c2.c2code = c3.c2code AND c3.C3CODE=p.C3CODE AND p.PCODE=#{pcode}
